text:
League 1
OM - Lille: which teams for Villas-Boas and Galtier?
First match of this Saturday in Ligue 1, Marseille receives Lille for a match that promises to be rich in emotions.
02 Nov 2019, 09:20 by Thomas Rassouli



This is one of the most anticipated games of this twelfth day of Ligue 1. At home and after a defeat suffered in the Classic against Paris Saint-Germain a week ago, Olympique Marseille wants to raise the head , facing the last dolphin of last season, Lille. For their part, the Dogues remain on a landslide victory against Bordeaux (3-0).




Kamara in the middle?




The probable compo of OM + 15 üì∑Credit Photo - Demivol√©e

Andr√© Villas-Boas should make some changes to compose his eleven. Alvaro Gonzalez back, Kamara could officer sentinel today, helped by Rongier and Sanson in midfield. Substitute against the PSG also, Amavi is tipped. In front, the trio Payet-Benedetto-Germain should be renewed.
R√©my waited




The probable composition of Lille + 15 üì∑Credit Photo - Demivol√©e

In Lille, we expect more defense three led by Fonte. Andr√© and Soumar√© at the recovery, the man in shape and expected for this meeting is in attack. Scorer last week, Remy is expected for this match and should evolve with Ikon√© and Yacizi at his side.
